RackPDU.description: This is the schema definition for the RackPDU Metrics.  It represents the properties for RackPDU Power Consumption and Power Limiting.
RackPDU.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a power metrics resource for a Redfish implementation.

title: RackPDU.RackPDU
